Title: Prohibits the recording of visual images of a person having a reasonable expectation of privacy while within a dwelling, when such images are recorded by another person outside the dwelling
Summary: Prohibits the recording of visual images of a person having a reasonable expectation of privacy while within a dwelling, when such images are recorded by another person outside the dwelling; makes such a violation a misdemeanor and establishes civil liability by private cause of action.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to capturing the visual image of a person within a dwelling when such person has a reasonable expectation of privacy
